long_description: The Protect-a-Bub 4-Season Weather Shield offers protection from the sun, rain, wind and bugs and works with 2-passenger strollers and joggers with a canopy. Contstructed out of a breathable polyester microfiber, the Weather Shield lets you adapt to changing weather, offering passengers maximum comfort and protection. Convenient zip-off design lets you switch between the sun/bug front panel or the PVC-free clear rain/wind panel. Full-coverage setup delivers 50+ UPF protection; partial-coverage setup offers a large mesh viewing window that protects kids from bugs and glare. Simple 1-step process allows easy conversion to the rain/wind setup, which uses a full-length PVC-free rain/wind panel for excellent protection with clear visibility. Zippered opening allows easy access to your kids inside. The Protect-a-Bub 4-Season Weather Shield fits all strollers and joggers with a canopy, and includes a carrying bag.
short_description: The Protect-a-Bub 4-Season Weather Shield offers protection from the sun, rain, wind and bugs and works with 2-passenger strollers and joggers with a canopy.
